Once a guy built a House. But he was confused on what to name it. So he decided to name it after the first thing he saw in the morning. When he woke up the next day , he saw his wife's Kundi. Hence he named the house Kundi Years later, The family was blessed with a kid. The guy pondered on what to name him. He used the same technique that he used to name his house. So the next day the first thing he saw was his dog's Appi. So the kid was named Appi. One tragic day, the house went ablaze. The guy called the fire department and said : Sire... ente Kundik thee pidichu. Appi athil kudungi poyi.

Sardarji Singaporil poyi. First time hotelil stay. Thooran Mutti. Bathroom thuranu nokiyappo European closet - munpu kandittialla. Enthu cheyanam annrainjooda. Thalangum velangum nadanu. Muttal sahikan vayya. Onnum Pinne aalochichilla - turban oori athil thoori. Ellam kazinju enthu cheyanam annarinjooda, nokyapo mele fan. Turban fanil vechu, aarum kanathirikan. Thoori ksheenichu verthu. Fan on cheythu. Nalu padum bhithiyil theetam. Aake nankedu. Reception vilichu room boye varan paranju. Room boy vannu. MattOru sardar. Thooriya Sardar: Oru 100 dollar koduthittu paranju please ethonnu clean cheythu tharanAm. Room boy: NjAan 200 dollar tharam - ingane paranu thoorana vidya enne koode padipichu tharanam

A man was listening to a public Ramayanam discourse. The storyline where Hanuman was going to Lanka to meet Sita with Rama's message. So our man had to urgently go to pee. However, it is not polite to leave a religious discourse midway but he had no other option and he left.  He found a bathroom, did his pee and then realized that he had to shit as well. So did both but there was no water to wash. He somehow managed to find some newspaper and cleaned himself. Meanwhile, the guy doing discourse had almost completed Hanuman's visit to Lanka and how he visited Sita, burnt Lanka and flew over the water back to India. So as our hero was entering the hall and walking towards his seat, the discourse person summarizes thus, ...... He went for 1 (meet Sita) and did 2 (meet Sita and burn Lanka) and returned without touching water. (referring to Hanuman). However, the hero felt uncomfortable wondering if he is referring to him instead.

Oru aal or islandil pettukidakkayirunnu. Ayaalde kaiyyil or blade maathrame ullu. Ayaal engane rekshapedum? Ans: Ayaal blade konde kaiyil oru murive undaakkum - chora veena mannil ninnuyarnnu vanna poomaram. Ayaal aa poomaram konde kappalundakkum. With that kappal, he will escape.
